ARESTRICTED //

NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.1(Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)

A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated: 26/11/2012

AVSEC CIRCULAR NO:: 18 /2012

Subject: Permission for access of vehicle up to the aircraft in respect of Ms. Mayawati,
former Chief Minister of U.P.

In succession of AVSEC Circular No. 16/2012 dated 19/11/2012 on the
subject cited above, it has been decided that in view of continued threat to the security
of Ms. Mayawati, she may be allowed the facility of proceeding directly to the aircraft in
her own vehicle, with escort, during departure/artival by air from/to all civil airports
in the country, for a period of one year with immediate effect.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).

"GX. Bhatnagar 6
Sr. Dy. Commissioner of Security (CA\

Distribution as per standard list
Copy to:

MCA (Shri U.K, Bhatia, Under Secretary)

), R.G. Bhawan, New Delhi: w.r.t. MCA letter
No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated 26/11/2012
